article_title: Accountable Care Organizations Eke Out "Teensy" Savings For Medicare

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: The minuscule savings attainable through ACOs--likely to be less than1% of Medicare spending--probably will be offset by the higher costs resulting from the adverse effects of ACOs, including reduced innovation and less competition. Conversely, competitive bidding in Medicare has the potential to save Medicare 9.5% annually.
